title: New to boards, Quality of life client suggestion
body:
Hey guys so I don't know if this has been suggested as i did not check the bulk of forums here.

I think Riot should implement something to remember your preferred roles in the lobby.
Not a huge task, and i feel as it would speed things along just ever so slightly.

Of course this would only be for ranked.
It need not look fancy nor adorned with particles
Anyhow, Just a thought :)

Thanks for listening hah.
